title: Cisco Umbrella DNS - DNS Traffic
description: This dashboard delivers a concise snapshot of network activity. Panels such as Total Requests, Blocked Requests, and Allowed Requests offer a quick overview of security efficacy. Users can explore Top DNS Querytypes and Identities to identify prevalent queries and traffic generators. With insights into external and internal requests, along with categorized traffic details, this dashboard provides a streamlined yet comprehensive understanding of network behavior and security events.

definition.content:
## Overview
This dashboard delivers a concise snapshot of network activity. Panels such as Total Requests, Blocked Requests, and Allowed Requests offer a quick overview of security efficacy. Users can explore Top DNS Querytypes and Identities to identify prevalent queries and traffic generators. With insights into external and internal requests, along with categorized traffic details, this dashboard provides a streamlined yet comprehensive understanding of network behavior and security events.

## Widgets

1. Total Requests
2. Total Blocked Requests
3. Total Allowed Requests
4. Total Proxied Requests
5. DNS Traffic Overtime
6. Top DNS Querytypes
7. Top Identities
8. Top Identity Types
9. Top External IP Requests
10. Top Internal IP Requests
11. Top Allowed Domains
12. Top Blocked Domains
13. Top Proxied Domains
14. Traffic Requests by Client IP (External IP)
15. DNS Traffic Overtime by Return Code
16. Top Blocked Categories
17. Traffic Distribution by Verdict and Categories
18. Log Details

definition.title: Traffic Requests by Client IP (External IP)
DNS Traffic Overtime by Return Code
Traffic Distribution by Verdict and Categories
